title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Instructional Strategy Design to Mitigate Online Education Fatigue

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online learning environments and proficiency in basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learner engagement can be maintained above 80% through asynchronous lecture design.
Knowledge-sharing efficiency can be improved by over 70% through small-group collaborative activities.
Attention decline intervals during 90-minute classes can be improved three or more times using activity transition techniques.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
